definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: † [[כָּרַע]] bow down (NH id.; Aram. [[כְּרַע]]; Ar. kara9a put one's mouth into water, or water-vessel; i.e. kneel to drink ? denom. fr. foll. ?—

bow [[על ברכים]] to drink Ju Jdg 7:5, Jdg 7:6, in supplication to Elijah 2Ki 1:13; in the worship of God 1Ki 8:34, Ezr 9:5; c. [[ברכים]] subj. and [[ל]] of God 1Ki 19:18, Is 45:23; without [[ברכים]] c. [[לִפְנֵי]] Ps 22:30, Ps 72:9; ‖[[השׁתחוה]] 2Ch 7:3, 2Ch 29:29, Ps 95:6, worship of God, but Es 3:2, Es 3:2, Es 3:5 in obeisance to Haman.
bow down, of the couching lion Ge 49:9, Nu 24:9 (both poetry).
preg. c. [[על]], bow down over (in order to lie with) a woman Job 31:10.

bow down, of a woman in childbirth 1Sa 4:19, so of animals Job 39:3; idols, removed by enemies Is 46:1, Is 46:2; [[בִּרְכַּיִם כּׂרְעוֹת]] Job 4:4 tottering (feeble) knees; of enemies in death, [[נפל]][[[ו]]][[כרע]] bow and fall down Ju Jdg 5:27, Jdg 5:27, Jdg 5:27; Ps 20:9 preg. Without [[נפל]] 2Ki 9:24, Is 65:12, c. [[תַּחַת]] Is 10:4.—

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: pf. 3 ms. [[הִכְרִיעַ]] Ps 78:31; 2 fs. sf. [[הִכְרַעְתִּנִי]] Ju Jdg 11:35; Impf. 2 ms. [[תַּכְרִיעַ]] 2Sa 22:40 = Ps 18:40; Imv. sf. [[הַכְרִיעֵהוּ]] Ps 17:13; Inf. abs. [[הַכְדֵעַ]] Ju Jdg 11:35.—
cause to bow in grief Ju Jdg 11:35, Jdg 11:35.
cause to bow down in death Ps 17:13, Ps 78:31, c. [[תַּחַת]] 2Sa 22:40 = Ps 18:40.
